description: This course covers database design principles, SQL, and database management systems.
Introduction to data structures, algorithm analysis, and problem-solving techniques.
Fundamentals of programming concepts, syntax, and problem-solving using Python.
Overview of various computing platforms, operating systems, and infrastructure technologies.
Development of web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and web frameworks.
Principles of network security, cryptography, and secure network design.
Software development lifecycle, project management, and quality assurance.
Introduction to data analysis, machine learning, and statistical techniques.
Fundamentals of AI, machine learning algorithms, and applications.
Cloud architectures, services, and deployment models.
Online marketing strategies, SEO, and social media marketing.
Starting and managing new business ventures.
Design and implementation of IoT systems.
Application of computational tools to humanities research.
Legal aspects of data collection and usage.
